title: Best of The Herd for Feb 25, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 25, 2020
description:
Colin says that Joe Burrow's small hands aren't everything but it does matter and its another knock on a guy being asked to turn around a struggling franchise. He explains why the 76ers need to make a choice between Joel Embiid and Ben Simmons and move forward. He wonders when Aaron Rodgers will enter "The Snark Tank" and have a response to his GM being open to drafting a QB. Plus, Eagles GM Howie Roseman joins Colin live from the NFL Combine and talks about what he prioritizes when drafting players and why making mistakes is part of the job.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
